definition: to interview (a particular person or on a particular topic)/special interview/special report based on such an interview
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate

sentences.english: The club is a new thing for young pople.
sentences.chinese: 俱乐部一个对是新东西是因为年轻人物专访。

sentences.english: After the lunch, I accompanied Pam to her first television interview.
sentences.chinese: 午餐之后，我陪同帕梅拉去参加她的第一次电视专访。

sentences.english: Recently, Wu, chairman of the hotel, the more-accepted an exclusive interview with our reporter.
sentences.chinese: 近日，该酒店董事长吴愈勇接受了本报记者的专访。

sentences.english: This is the third interview in a series entitled The Many Paths to Translation Work.
sentences.chinese: 本文是“条条大路通翻译”人物专访的第三篇。

sentences.english: He recently agreed to answer 12 questions in-school.
sentences.chinese: 他最近同意在校接受了专访。

sentences.english: During the interview, she revealed that she cried her heart out every night when she was alone.
sentences.chinese: 事过境迁，她接受专访时透露其实在人后却哭成泪人。

sentences.english: "It was mind-boggling, " he recalled in a recent interview with Canadian conservationists.
sentences.chinese: 最近他接受加拿大保育人士专访时回忆道。

sentences.english: Jap an Yinai Global CEO Flowery wild is Bo said in an interview yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 日本伊奈全球总裁杉野正博昨天接受记者专访时说。

sentences.english: It should be said the last interview of Mui Jei at 903.
sentences.chinese: 应该话系梅姐最后上来903的专访。

sentences.english: Interview by Ms Cui, University of the Arts London-China Recruitment Office, London.
sentences.chinese: 接受伦敦艺术大学中国代表处崔主任专访，伦敦。

sentences.english: Daily newspaper El Pais went to interview him.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙《国家报》对他进行了专访。

sentences.english: To make exclusive interviews with those big shots is difficult nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 现如今对那些大腕做专访是很难的事情。

sentences.english: Cheng hope magazine interview by Tina is responsible for the next week.
sentences.chinese: 成斌希望杂志社下周的专访由天娜负责。

sentences.english: In this video we meet sifu Ip Chun, son and successor of none other than Ip Man.
sentences.chinese: 本视频送上叶问之子叶准师傅的专访。

sentences.english: Interviewing experts and seniority in the eyewear industry, sharing their secrets of success.
sentences.chinese: 专访行内重要人士，分享行内经验及成功之道。

sentences.english: They spoke to TIME's Lisa Takeuchi Cullen.
sentences.chinese: 时代记者丽莎塔库奇库伦对二人进行了专访。

definition: to interview/to gather news/to hunt for and collect/to cover
to refer to/to speak about/to talk about
specific topic (addressed by a book, lecture, TV program etc)/article, report or program etc on a specific topic
to talk freely/to discuss without inhibition
special correspondent/sb dispatched on a mission/special commissioner
to express in words or writing/to make a speech (esp. short introduction, vote of thanks, afterword, funeral homily etc)/to address (an audience)/same as 致詞|致词
